business_intent: To build an input form with various UI elements for user interaction. | To provide users with the ability to export test plans in JSON and PDF formats for documentation and auditing purposes.

ticket_details.description:
1. URL Field
2. Have an area for raw text
3. Have a “load from JIRA” button
4. Have a button to Generate test plan 
5. Have a button to generate RTM
6. Have multiple tabs for ticket, rtm, requirement,...

1. Enable exporting the generated test plan for documentation or audits.
Acceptance Criteria
1.  “Download JSON” button
2. “Download PDF” button
3. PDF mirrors UI layout
Technical Notes
1. Use backend...

ui_tests.expected_result: All specified tabs are present, visible, and accessible.
steps: Navigate to the application
Verify that the 'ticket tab' is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction)
Verify that the 'rtm tab' is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction)
Verify that the 'requirement tab' is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction)
Verify that the 'test by requirement tab' is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction)
Verify that the 'test by type tab' is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction)
ui_tests.title: Happy path: Verify UI elements for input form

ui_tests.expected_result: PDF file is downloaded and mirrors the UI layout.
steps: Navigate to the test plan page.
Verify that the 'Download PDF' button is present on the screen, visible to the user, and accessible (enabled and ready for interaction).
Click the 'Download PDF' button.
Verify that the PDF file is downloaded successfully.
ui_tests.title: Happy path: Download PDF button

ui_tests.expected_result: The layout of the PDF matches the UI layout.
steps: Navigate to the test plan page.
Click the 'Download PDF' button.
Open the downloaded PDF file.
Verify that the layout of the PDF matches the layout of the test plan displayed on the UI.
ui_tests.title: Happy path: PDF mirrors UI layout

ui_tests.expected_result: The absence of the 'Download JSON' button indicates a failure in the happy path.
steps: Navigate to the test plan page.
Verify that the 'Download JSON' button is not present on the screen.
ui_tests.title: Negative: JSON button not present

ui_tests.expected_result: The absence of the 'Download PDF' button indicates a failure in the happy path.
steps: Navigate to the test plan page.
Verify that the 'Download PDF' button is not present on the screen.
ui_tests.title: Negative: PDF button not present

ui_tests.expected_result: The layout of the PDF does not match the UI layout, indicating a failure.
steps: Navigate to the test plan page.
Click the 'Download PDF' button.
Open the downloaded PDF file.
Verify that the layout of the PDF does not match the layout of the test plan displayed on the UI.
ui_tests.title: Negative: PDF does not mirror UI layout
